verses.verse: Set the trumpet <WH7782> to thy mouth <WH2441>. He shall come as an eagle <WH5404> against the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>, because they have transgressed <WH5674> my covenant <WH1285>, and trespassed <WH6586> against my law <WH8451>.
Israel <WH3478> shall cry <WH2199> unto me, My God <WH430>, we know <WH3045> thee.
Israel <WH3478> hath cast off <WH2186> the thing that is good <WH2896>: the enemy <WH341> shall pursue <WH7291> him.

They have set up kings <WH4427>, but not by me: they have made princes <WH7786>, and I knew <WH3045> it not: of their silver <WH3701> and their gold <WH2091> have they made <WH6213> them idols <WH6091>, that they may be cut off <WH3772>.

Â¶ Thy calf <WH5695>, O Samaria <WH8111>, hath cast <WH2186> thee off; mine anger <WH639> is kindled <WH2734> against them: how long will it be ere <WH3808> they attain <WH3201> to innocency <WH5356>?
For from Israel <WH3478> was it also: the workman <WH2796> made <WH6213> it; therefore it is not God <WH430>: but the calf <WH5695> of Samaria <WH8111> shall be broken in pieces <WH7616>.

For they have sown <WH2232> the wind <WH7307>, and they shall reap <WH7114> the whirlwind <WH5492>: it hath no stalk <WH7054>: the bud <WH6780> shall yield <WH6213> no meal <WH7058>: if <WH194> so be it yield <WH6213>, the strangers <WH2114> shall swallow it up <WH1104>.
Israel <WH3478> is swallowed up <WH1104>: now shall they be among the Gentiles <WH1471> as a vessel <WH3627> wherein is no pleasure <WH2656>.
For they are gone up <WH5927> to Assyria <WH804>, a wild ass <WH6501> alone <WH909> by himself: Ephraim <WH669> hath hired <WH8566> lovers <WH158>.

Yea, though they have hired <WH8566> among the nations <WH1471>, now will I gather <WH6908> them, and they shall sorrow <WH2490> a little <WH4592> for the burden <WH4853> of the king <WH4428> of princes <WH8269>.
Because Ephraim <WH669> hath made many <WH7235> altars <WH4196> to sin <WH2398>, altars <WH4196> shall be unto him to sin <WH2398>.
I have written <WH3789> to him the great things <WH7230> <WH7239> of my law <WH8451>, but they were counted <WH2803> as a strange thing <WH2114>.

They sacrifice <WH2076> flesh <WH1320> for the sacrifices <WH2077> of mine offerings <WH1890>, and eat <WH398> it; but the LORD <WH3068> accepteth <WH7521> them not; now will he remember <WH2142> their iniquity <WH5771>, and visit <WH6485> their sins <WH2403>: they shall return <WH7725> to Egypt <WH4714>.

For Israel <WH3478> hath forgotten <WH7911> his Maker <WH6213>, and buildeth <WH1129> temples <WH1964>; and Judah <WH3063> hath multiplied <WH7235> fenced <WH1219> cities <WH5892>: but I will send <WH7971> a fire <WH784> upon his cities <WH5892>, and it shall devour <WH398> the palaces <WH759> thereof.
